Articles.Content:
Alright, there\'s the old Drag race, for only the runway, but what About the SUPER drag race, from KSC to the mountains north? That be the challenge.

No RCS thrusters.

No SAS

I\'m looking for a 1000 MPS, can you do it?
Oh, and you must also stop SAFELY (No parts exploded)

But... there are no mountains north of KSC, only water. If you mean the mountains to the west, there\'s already a similar challenge going on here: [http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12832.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12832.0)
I know, but it isnt for dragsters is it?
